metadata.title: CVE-2021-3736 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the Linux kernel. A memory leak problem was found inmbochs_ioctl in samples/vfio-mdev/mbochs.c in Virtual Function I/O (VFIO)Mediated devices. This flaw could allow a local attacker to leak internalkernel information.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
